TopicTitle: Extremely fast rover "Ghost" safe speed 100+ m/s on Tylo

Articles.Content:
"GHOST" is a light rover win ion engines (1.67 t with kerbal in command chair). Can safely (almost ) move on Tylo surface with speed 100+ m/s.

Maximum speed on flat surface Kerbin or Laythe ~50 m/s, on this speed rover do not have any problems with surface imperfections.

And this thing can turn on full speed with help from SAS, slowly and carefully by short clicks (45 degrees turn can take 30-60 seconds). On low speed (10-20 m/s) this thing is very maneuverable
